definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to walk (side part of split character)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
Tongdao Dong autonomous county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan
Tongdao Dong autonomous county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan
track (for trains etc)/orbit (of a satellite)/(fig.) a person's established path in life/desired trajectory (of a business or other endeavor)/(audio engineering) track/(quantum mechanics) orbital
don't tell me .../could it be that...?

sentences.english: If there are chaos in the society, your planning cannot precede them.
sentences.chinese: 人道沒有出現禍亂的時候，不可先策劃興師。

sentences.english: Enlightenment, it seems, always comes from an earnest study of the Word of God.
sentences.chinese: 啓迪似乎總是從懇切地研究上帝的道而來。

sentences.english: "Your lecture is called 'From Satori to Silicon Valley, ' " he explained.
sentences.chinese: “你的講座叫做‘從禪悟到硅谷’，”他解釋道。

sentences.english: Her mom replied, “Because they love each other.” MMT
sentences.chinese: 她的媽媽回答道，“因爲他們彼此相愛。”

sentences.english: See, I stopped at the red traffic light, and I swear it never turned green!
sentences.chinese: 紅燈亮了，我踩了腳剎車，誰知道那燈再沒變綠過。

sentences.english: Moral criteria are nature, the Tao, artificiality and manner.
sentences.chinese: 自然，道，人爲，禮儀等道德標準。

sentences.english: "I could look in the encyclopedia, " she said to herself.
sentences.chinese: “我可以去查百科全書，”姍姍自言自語道。

sentences.english: Small niches line the walkway and are illuminated by diyas (small lamps) in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 小壁龕沿走道排布，晚上被小油燈照亮。

sentences.english: "More than 50 of them used to be my workmates, " added Fan.
sentences.chinese: 他還補充道，“有50多戶都曾是我的伐木工友。”

sentences.english: She orted to cover a laugh and apologized.
sentences.chinese: 她打了個鼾來蓋住她的大笑聲，然後道了道歉。

sentences.english: I miss the good old days, 'she added sentimentally .
sentences.chinese: “我懷念過去那些美好的日子，”她動情地補充道。

sentences.english: Tommy said that he was dehumanized by his teachers, psychiatrists, and social workers.
sentences.chinese: 托米說他受到老師，精神病專家和社工的非人道對待。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin, can be seen everywhere in China and is said not only very unique landscape.
sentences.chinese: 篷布，在中國不僅隨處可見而且是道很獨特的風景。

sentences.english: Hopson Dongjiao Villa, Cross the Longdong Avenue , .
sentences.chinese: 合生東郊別墅，縱橫龍東大道。

sentences.english: A seismic trace calculated from well -log data is called a synthetic seismogram.
sentences.chinese: 由測井資料計算出來的地震記錄道稱爲合成地震記錄。

sentences.english: "What about me?" brayed the donkey. "I thought I was the cleverest. "
sentences.chinese: “那我呢？”驢子叫道，“我覺得我纔是最聰明的。”

definition: interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
first tone in Mandarin (high, level tone)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
yes, that's right/variant of 似的[shi4 de5]
